channel.title: Need big help getting a server started :/
channel.description: Im trying to start a server on my new laptop and im having the hardest time getting it all to work. i found a good server base i like (insanityx) but when i try to run the server, it tells me it cant find the path specified. and i tried fixing just cant. and on the client it would always close when i click 2 times. Could someone please help me get this figured out, possibly team viewer it and get it all working for me. please.

item.title: Need big help getting a server started :/
item.dc:creator: @xinfectionx xinfectionx
item.description:
@xinfectionx wrote:

okay. its in the program files (x86) not sure if thats okay.
but i have jdk1.6.0 and jdk1.6.0_18

Read full topic

item.title: Need big help getting a server started :/
item.dc:creator: @sam81199 sam81199
item.description:
@sam81199 wrote:

Do you have the basic’s like JDK 7.2

If you do change the Run.bat right click and edit

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin\java.exe”

change the jdk to what ever you have and then it might run if you have your environmental variables set correcly

Read full topic
